name: SpellBowl
0:
”Alexa, run spelling bowl”
”Select words between 1 and 5”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spelling bowl
des: This application has a list of 750 words for Indiana Academic Spell Bowl Elementary Division 2020 Competition. The application will let you choose the range of words you want to practice and will dictate them for you. If an answer is wrong, then it would help the students by spelling it right. Also students can get the meaning of the word as required. You can randomize words if needed by just using command randomize.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
